name: AzSKSVTs
description: Scan Azure resources for security issues using AzSK.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running PowerShell

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: ResourceGroup Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of resource groups against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.

inputs.name: TagName
inputs.label: Tag Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag Name/Value pair to identify resources against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.

inputs.name: TagValue
inputs.label: Tag Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag Name/Value pair to identify resources against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.

inputs.name: SubscriptionId
inputs.label: Subscription ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the subscription hosting the resources against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.

inputs.name: EnableOMSLogging
inputs.label: Enable OMS Logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this task to publish SVT evalution results to an OMS workspace (specified via environment variables).

inputs.name: AggregateControlsStatus
inputs.label: Aggregate Control Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Switch to aggregate the SVTs control output. When this is turned off each control failure is shown as one task error in the summary output.

inputs.name: DisableAutoUpdate
inputs.label: Do not auto-update AzSK
inputs.helpMarkDown: Switch to toggle auto update of AzSK and required AzureRM modules on the build server. Keep this un-checked for Hosted agents.
